tuv.seg: Fair grounds for dismissal
Cúiseanna maithe le dífhostú
If you are dismissed from your employment you may, under certain conditions, bring a claim for unfair dismissal against your employer
Má dhífhostaítear tú, is féidir leat éileamh maidir le dífhostú éagórach a dhéanamh i gcoinne d'fhostóra, faoi réir coinníollacha áirithe
Apart from a case involving constructive dismissal a dismissal is presumed to be unfair unless your employer can show substantial grounds to justify it
Seachas cás ina bhfuil dífhostú inchiallaithe i gceist, glactar leis go bhfuil dífhostú éagórach mura bhfuil ar chumas an fhostóra a léiriú go bhfuil cúiseanna maithe ag baint leis

So if you qualify to bring a claim and there was a dismissal, your employer has to prove that the dismissal was a fair one, that is, that there were fair grounds for the dismissal and that fair procedures were followed

Mar sin de, má bhí dífhostú ann agus má tá tú i dteideal éileamh a dhéanamh, caithfidh an fostóir a chruthú gur dífhostú cóir a bhí ann .i. go raibh cúiseanna maithe leis an dífhostú agus gur cloíodh leis na nósanna imeachta cearta:
If you are dismissed from your job you are entitled to a statutory minimum period of notice if you have worked at least 13 weeks for your employer
Má dhífhostaítear tú ó do phost, tá fógra íosthréimhse reachtúil ag dul do gach fostaí atá fostaithe ag a f(h)ostóir ar feadh 13 sheachtain ar a laghad
Your written contract of employment may provide for a longer period of notice
D'fhéadfadh do chonradh oibre foráil a dhéanamh i gcomhair fógra tréimhse níos faide
Under the unfair dismissals legislation you may ask your employer for a written statement of the reasons for your dismissal
Faoin reachtaíocht, tá sé de cheart agat ráiteas scríofa a iarraidh ó d'fhostóir ag léiriú cúiseanna an dífhostaithe
Your employer should provide this within 14 days of your request
Ba chóir don bhfostóir é seo a chur ar fáil laistigh de 14 lá
In order to justify the dismissal your employer:
Le dífhostú a chruthú ní mór don bhfostóir:
• Must show that your dismissal was connected with one or more of the potentially fair grounds set out in the legislation
• A léiriú go raibh baint ag an dífhostú le ceann nó níos mó de na cúiseanna atá leagtha síos sa reachtaíocht
• Must show that fair procedures were followed and must have acted fairly
• A léiriú gur cloíodh leis na nósanna imeachta cearta agus gur iompair sé/sí é/í féin mar ba cheart
• Will have to disprove any allegation by you that your case involves any of the automatically unfair reasons for dismissal
• A bheith in ann a bhréagnú go bhfuil baint ag aon líomhain a dhéanann tusa leis na cúiseanna éagóracha le dífhostú sa ghnáthchúrsa
Fair grounds for dismissal
Cúiseanna maithe le dífhostú
Your employer could give one or more of the following reasons for your dismissal:
D'fhéadfadh d'fhostóir cúis amháin nó níos mó ón liosta seo thíos a thabhairt mar chúis leis an dífhostú:
This includes issues such as lateness, absenteeism and persistent absence through illness or injury, either short-term or long-term
Clúdaíonn sé sin cúiseanna ar nós déanacht, neamhláithreacht agus neamhláithreacht leanúnach mar gheall ar thinneas nó ghortú, cibé gearrthéarmach nó fadthéarmach

If lateness or absenteeism is at issue, your employer will be expected to have documentary proof of this allegation, such as clocking-in records or documented absences on file that are not medically certified

Má tá déanacht nó neamhláithreacht i gceist, ba cheart cruthúnas faisnéisneach a bheith ag d'fhostóir, ar nós taifid chlogála isteach nó cruthúnas neamhláithreachta agus iad gan deimhniú dochtúra a bheith leo
In addition, your employer will also be expected to show that you were made aware of the problem and that you were warned as to the consequences for your continued employment

Ina theannta sin, beifear ag súil go mbeidh an fostóir in ann cruthúnas a thabhairt gur chuir sé/sí an fhadhb in iúl duit agus gur tugadh foláireamh duit maidir leis an tionchar a bheadh aici ar bhuanú d'fhostaíochta
If illness or injury is at issue, it is often assumed that you cannot be dismissed fairly while on certified sick leave from your work
Má tá breoiteacht nó gortú i gceist, meastar go minic nach féidir duine a dhífhostú go cóir agus é/í ar shaoire bhreoiteachta óna (h)obair
However, this is not true
Níl sé sin fíor, áfach
It is difficult to lay down hard and fast rules to apply to these cases as each will be treated on its own merits
Is deacair rialacha dochta daingne a leagan síos maidir leis na cásanna seo mar measfar gach ceann acu ar a fhiúntas féin
Issues such as length of service, previous record and the importance of the job will vary and will have to be taken into account
Beidh éagsúlacht i ngach cás, mar shampla faid sheirbhíse, do thaifead oibre roimhe seo agus tábhacht na fostaíochta
These types of claim are often divided into short-term and long-term absences
Roinntear an cineál éileamh seo go minic i neamhláithreacht ghearrthéarmach agus neamhláithreacht fhadtéarmach
Dismissal related to short-term illness generally occurs where you have a medical problem that results in frequent absences for short periods from the workplace
Tarlaíonn dífhostú maidir le breoiteacht ghearrthéarmach nuair a bhíonn tú neamhláithreach go minic mar thoradh ar fadhb sláinte a bheith ort

Assuming that the genuine nature of your problem was not in question, your employer will have to show that a pattern of absence exists, that it is causing problems, that the problem is unlikely to get better and that you have been warned that dismissal is likely

Ag glacadh leis nach raibh aon amhras faoin bhfadhb sláinte, beidh ar an bhfostóir a thaispeáint go bhfuil pátrún neamhláithreachta i bhfeidhm agus go bhfuil sé ag cothú deacrachtaí, nach bhfuil dealramh ann go bhfeabhsóidh an fhadhb agus gur tugadh foláireamh duit gur cosúil go bhfuil dífhostú i ndán
In a case of a long-term absence, however, your employer will be expected to obtain detailed medical evidence that an early return to work is unlikely
I gcás neamhláithreachta fadthéarmaí, áfach, beifear ag súil go bhfaighidh d'fhostóir fianaise leighis mhionchruinn ag rá nach cosúil go mbeidh tú ag filleadh ar an obair ar ball
There is no set period of absence by which it can be said that a dismissal will or will not be considered reasonable
Níl aon tréimhse socraithe neamhláithreachta leagtha síos inar féidir a rá go bhfuil nó nach bhfuil dífhostú réasúnach
Obviously, the longer the absence, the easier it is for your employer to show that it is causing genuine difficulty in terms of the organisation of the workplace
Dá fhad an neamhláithreacht is ea is éasca don bhfostóir a thaispeáint go bhfuil sé ag cothú fíordheacrachtaí maidir le heagraíocht na háite oibre
In terms of medical evidence you may be required to attend your employer's medical expert
I dtéarmaí fianaise leighis d'fhéadfadh go mbeadh ort freastal ar shaineolaí leighis de chuid d'fhostóra

If there is a conflict of medical evidence between you and your employer as to the possible return date, your employer will be expected to get a second opinion before taking the decision to dismiss you

Má tá coimhlint ó thaobh fianaise leighis idir tusa agus d'fhostóir maidir leis an dáta fillte a d'fhéadfadh a bheith ann, beifear ag súil go lorgóidh an fostóir dara tuairim sula ndéanfaidh sé an cinneadh tú a dhífhostú

However, it is important to note that if your illness might be considered a disability under employment equality legislation, your rights under that particular legislation would also have to be taken into consideration

Áfach, is tábhachtach aire a thabhairt, dá mbreathnódh ar do thinneas mar mhíchumas faoin reachtaíocht comhionannais fostaíochta, caithfidh do chearta faoin reachtaíocht seo bheith san áireamh freisin
Competence refers to your ability to do your job
Baineann inniúlacht le do chumas do jab a dhéanamh
In the first place, you need to be made aware of the standards that are expected of you, and these must refer to the job you were hired to do
Ar an gcéad dul síos, beifear ag súil le caighdeáin uait agus ní mór iad sin a léiriú duit. Caithfidh go mbaineann siad leis an jab ar fostaíodh tú dó
Secondly, if you fall short of the required standard, this must be clearly explained to you
Ar an dara dul síos, mura sroicheann tú an caighdeán riachtanach, ní mór é sin a chur in iúl duit
This should be done through a formal set procedure
Ba chóir é sin a dhéanamh trí mheán nós imeachta foirmeálta faoi leith
Your employer should also specify what improvements are necessary
Ba chóir don bhfostóir na feabhsúcháin riachtanacha a shonrú duit
These should be achievable and a reasonable timeframe must be allowed for the improvement
Ba chóir dóibh siúd a bheith indéanta agus ní mór teaorainn ama réasúnta a cheadú don bhfeabhas
Ultimately, your employer should give you a final warning setting out the likelihood of dismissal
Faoi dheireadh, ba chóir don bhfostóir rabhadh deireanach a thabhairt duit a léiríonn an dealraitheacht dífhostaithe
Fair dismissal on grounds of qualifications can happen in two ways
Tarlaíonn dífhostú cóir mar gheall ar chúiseanna cáilíochtaí i ndá bhealach
One situation is where you misled your employer about qualifications you had when applying for the job
Cás amháin ná nuair a chuir tú míthreoir ar an bhfostóir maidir leis na cáilíochtaí a bhí agat nuair a chuir tú isteach ar an bpost
The other is where your employer made continued employment conditional upon your obtaining further qualifications and you failed to achieve this, having been given a reasonable opportunity to do so

An cás eile ná nuair a gheall an fostóir fostaíocht leanúnach duit ar an gcoinníoll go dtabharfá faoi cháilíochtaí breise a fháil agus theip ort an coinníoll sin a chomhlíonadh cé gur tugadh deis réasúnta duit
As a ground for fair dismissal the term conduct covers a very large area of behaviour
Mar chúis le dífhostú cóir clúdaíonn an téarma iompar réimse leathan iompraíochta
There is a need to distinguish between gross misconduct and ordinary instances of misconduct
Tá gá le idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir mí-iompar tromchúiseach agus gnátheachtraí mí-iompair
Gross misconduct may give rise to instant (summary) dismissal without notice or pay in lieu of notice
D'fhéadfadh mí-iompar tromchúiseach dífhostú láithreach (achoimre) a spreagadh gan fógra nó pá in áit fógra
Examples of gross misconduct include assault, drunkenness, stealing, bullying or serious breach of your employer's policies and practices
Samplaí den mhí-iompar tromchúiseach ná ionsaí, meisce, gadaíocht, bulaíocht nó sárú ar bheartanna agus cleachtais an fhostóra
Your contract of employment may contain further information concerning gross misconduct
D'fhéadfadh níos mó eolais a bheith i do chonradh fostaíochta maidir le mí-iompar tromchúiseach

Ordinary instances of misconduct may be a series of minor incidents which, when taken together, are enough to warrant dismissal, although your employer is obliged to give you notice or pay in lieu of notice in this type of situation

Maidir leis na gnátheachtraí mí-iompair, d'fhéadfadh sraith mioneachtraí a bheith i gceist ach, nuair a chuirtear le chéile iad tugann sé údar ceart le dífhostú. Cibé, tá dualgas ar an bhfostóir fógra nó pá in áit fógra a thabhairt duit
Your employer will need to investigate each situation adequately to obtain all the facts of the case
Caithfidh an fostóir gach cás a fhiosrú i gceart chun teacht ar na fíricí ar fad a bhaineann leis an gcás
Except in cases of gross misconduct, you must have been given appropriate warnings about your conduct and been made aware that dismissal might result if the problems continue

Ach amháin i gcásanna mí-iompair thromchúisigh, tá sé riachtanach gur tugadh rabhaidh iomchuí duit faoi d'iompar agus gur léiríodh duit go raibh seans maith ann go mbeadh dífhostú mar thoradh ar an iompar sin dá leanfadh de na fadhbanna
If this has been done, the dismissal is fair, because you have been given a chance to improve your conduct
Má cuireadh an méid sin i gcrích, tá an dífhostú cóir, mar tugadh an deis duit d'iompar a fheabhsú

The Workplace Relations Commission's Code of Practice: Grievance and Disciplinary Procedures states that employers should have written grievance and disciplinary procedures and they should give employees copies of these at the start of their employment

D'fhoilisgh an Coimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre Cód Cleachtais: Nósanna Imeachta Casaoide agus Araíonachta a shonraíonn gur chóir nósanna imeachta casaoide agus araíonachta a bheith ag fostóirí agus gur chóir dóibh cóipeanna díobh seo a thabhairt d'fhostaithe ag tús a gcuid fostaíochta
Under the unfair dismissals legislation employers are required to give the employee in written notice of the procedures to be followed before an employee is dismissed
Faoi reactaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach tá dualgas ar fhostóirí fógra scríofa de na nósanna imeachta a leanfar a thabhairt d'fhostaí sula ndíbrítear fostaí óna p(h)ost
This must be done within 28 days of entering the contract of employment
Caithfear é seo a dhéanamh laistigh de 28 lá ó chonradh fostaíochta a dhéanamh
In this case your employer will want to show that a redundancy situation exists and that therefore the dismissal is fair
Sa chás seo beidh an fostóir ag iarraidh a thaispeáint go bhfuil cás iomarcaíochta ann agus mar sin de go bhfuil an dífhostú cóir

To counter this, you may present one or more of the following arguments: that there is no economic justification for the redundancy; that you have been replaced; or that you were unfairly selected for redundancy

Chun é sin a bhréagnú, is féidir leat ceann nó níos mó ná ceann amháin de na hargóintí seo a dhéanamh: nach bhfuil aon bhunús eacnamaíoch leis an iomarcaíocht; gur fostaíodh duine eile i d'áit; gur roghnaíodh tú go héagórach don iomarcaíocht
Your employer may dismiss you if your continued employment would contravene the law
Is féidir leis an bhfostóir tú a dhífostú dá sáródh buanú d'fhostaíochta riachtanas dlí eile
For example, you need a current driving licence to work, but you have lost your licence on a drunk driving charge
Cuir i gcás go bhfuil ceadúnas tiomána reatha uait don bhfostaíocht, ach gur chaill tú do cheadúnas mar cúisíodh tú le bheith ag tiomáint agus tú ólta
You cannot continue to work without breaking the law and dismissal may be justified
Ní féidir leat leanúint san obair gan an dlí a shárú agus féadann údar maith a bheith leis an dífhostú
However, your employer might be expected to look at alternatives depending on all the facts of the case
D'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh ar an bhfostóir féachaint ar roghanna eile, ag brath ar na fíricí ar fad a bhaineann leis an gcás
This category is designed to include any situations not covered above
Díríonn an aicme seo ar aon chineál cás nach bhfuil clúdaithe thuas
Your employer will be required to establish that there were other substantial grounds and that they justify your dismissal
Caithfidh an fostóir a chruthú go raibh cúiseanna substaintiúla eile agus go dtugann siad údar maith le dífhostú
Certain reasons for dismissal are considered to be automatically unfair
Meastar go bhfuil cúiseanna áirithe do dhífhostú éagórach sa ghnáthchúrsa
• membership or proposed membership of a trade union or engaging in trade union activities, whether within permitted times during work or outside of working hours
• ballraíocht ag an bhfostaí, nó tá ballraíocht a bheith ar intinn aige/aici, de cheardchumann nó gníomhaíocht in imeachtaí ceardchumainn,
• religious or political opinions
• tuairimí creidimh nó polaitiúla
• legal proceedings against an employer where an employee is a party or a witness
• imeachtaí dlíthiúla in aghaidh fostóra nuair atá an fostaí mar pháirtí nó finné
• race, colour, sexual orientation, age or membership of the Traveller community
• cine, dath, claonadh gnéis,aois nó duine den Lucht Siúil
• pregnancy, giving birth or breastfeeding or any matters connected with pregnancy or birth
• toircheas, saolú linbh nó tabhairt chun cíche nó aon rud a bhaineann le toircheas nó breith
• availing of rights under legislation such as maternity leave, adoptive leave, paternity leave, carer's leave, parental or force majeure leave

• an fostaí a bheith i mbun nó ag beartú cearta faoin reachtaíocht a chur i ngníomh ar nós saoire mháithreachais, saoire altramais, saoire atharthachta, saoire cúramóra,saoire thuismitheora nó saoire force majeure

Note: employment equality legislation prohibits dismissal based on any of the following 9 grounds for discrimination: gender, civil status, family status, age, disability, religious belief, race, sexual orientation or membership of the Traveller community

Nóta: faoin reachtaíocht comhionannais fostaíochta ní féidir le fostóir aon duine a roghnú ar son dífhostaithe ar aon cheann den naoi gcúis leatroma seo a leanas: gnéas, stádas sibhialta, stádas teaghlaigh, aois, míchumas, creideamh, cine, claonadh gnéis nó duine den Lucht Siúil
So, for example, if you have been employed for less than a year you may not be able to bring a claim under the unfair dismissals legislation, but it could be possible under equality legislation

Mar sin, cuir i gcás go raibh tú fostaithe ar feadh níos lú ná bliain, d'fhéadfadh nach mbeifeá a bheith in ann éileamh a dhéanamh faoin reachtaíocht dífhostaithe éagóracha , ach d'fhéadfá é a dhéanamh faoi reachtaíocht comhionannais
When dismissal is being considered your employer is expected to have disciplinary procedures in place and to follow them
Nuair atá dífhostú á mheas, ba cheart nósanna imeachta araíonachta a bheith i bhfeidhm ag an bhfostóir agus ba cheart dó/di cloí leo
Disciplinary procedures set out the stages and process the employer will follow in relation to alleged shortcomings of an employee
Leagann nósanna imeachta araíonachta amach na céimeanna agus an próiseas a chloífidh an fostóir leo maidir le lochtanna líomhnaithe fostóra
Generally, the procedure allows for informal warnings leading to written warnings and ultimately to dismissal as described in the Code of Practice on grievance and disciplinary procedures

Go ginearálta, ceadaíonn an nós imeachta rabhaidh neamhfhoirmiúla as a dtagann rabhaidh scríofa agus dhífhostú faoi dheireadh, mar a deirtear sa Chód Cleachtais ar nósanna imeachta casaoide agus araíonachta
Your employer must follow fair procedures and is required to give you appropriate warnings, make you fully aware of the allegations against you and give you an opportunity to present your side

Caithfidh d'fhostóir cloí le nósanna imeachta cóir agus beidh air/uirthi rabhaidh chuí a thabhairt duit, tú a chur ar an eolas maidir le líomhaintí a dhéantar i do choinne agus deis a thabhairt duit do chás a thabhairt
You must also be allowed the right to be represented in any disciplinary procedures by, for example, your trade union official
I nósanna imeachta araíonachta ar bith tá an ceart agat chun ionadaíochta ó, mar shampla, oifigeach do cheardchumainn
In deciding a case, the body hearing it must take into account the reasonableness or otherwise of your employer's conduct
Nuair atá do chás á mheas, caithfidh an lucht éisteachta aird a thabhairt ar an gné réasúnta nó eile a bhain le hiompar an fhostóra
In addition, the question as to whether or not your employer had a dismissal procedure in place will also be taken into account
Ina theannta sin, féachfar ar an gceist an raibh nó nach raibh nós imeachta dífhostaithe i bhfeidhm agus cuirfear é sin san áireamh chomh maith
If you wish to make a claim for unfair dismissal you should do so within 6 months of the date of dismissal
Más mian leat éileamh a dhéanamh ar son dífhostaithe éagóraigh, ba chóir duit é a dhéanamh laistigh de 6 mhí tar éis dáta an dífhostaithe
This time limit may be extended to 12 months in cases if there was a reasonable cause for the delay
Féadfar an teorainn ama seo a leathnú go dtí 12 mhí i gcásanna nach rabhthas in ann an t-éileamh a chur isteach laistigh de 6 mhí mar gheall ar chúinsí réasúnacha
If you qualify under the unfair dismissals legislation, you may bring your claim to the Workplace Relations Commission using the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie

Má cháilíonn tú faoin reachtaíocht dífhostaithe éagóracha, is féidir leat an t-éileamh a thabhairt faoi bhráid an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre tríd an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
Complaints will be referred to an adjudication officer for hearing
Cuirfear gearáin faoi bhráid breithneora an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre i gcomhair éisteacht
All decisions of an adjudication officer can be appealed to the Labour Court
Tá ceart achomhairc chuig an Chúirt Oibreachais tar éis cinnidh an bhreithneoir

For information in order to seek redress under the Acts contact the Workplace Relations Commission's Information and Customer Service - see 'Where to apply' below. Where to apply Workplace Relations Commission Information and Customer Service O'Brien Road Carlow R93 W7W2 Ireland Opening Hours: Mon. to Fri

Le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise nó foirmeacha gearáin chun cúiteamh a lorg faoi na hAchtanna téigh i dteagmháil leis an tSeirbhís Fhaisnéise agus Custaiméara an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre
